title: Lakshmi Kasu Pendant - Goddess of Prosperity
features: This exquisite pendant features a intricately detailed depiction of Goddess Lakshmi seated on a lotus. The design incorporates traditional Nakshi work and is adorned with sparkling brilliant cut diamonds set in a Pave setting to enhance their brilliance. Cascading down from the ornate design are smooth oval shaped natural emeralds, adding a touch of auspiciousness and color. The lotus motif signifies purity and enlightenment.
occasions: Half-Saree function). A stunning piece for adding a touch of heritage to any special event.
description: This Lakshmi pendant is more than just jewelry; it's a symbol of wealth, prosperity, and divine blessings. The exquisite craftsmanship, combined with the use of precious gemstones and traditional Nakshi detailing, makes it a valuable heirloom piece to cherish for generations. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a rich, lustrous finish, enhancing its overall appeal.
